sy: Brits know their tea and they love their cakes! Devour melt-in-the-mouth brownies at bakery Konditor & Cook, or hybrid cakes at Bea of Bloomsbury. However, if you're looking for pure indulgence, you can't beat a fancy afternoon tea among the palm trees at The Landmark London, or mix it up at Sketch, known as much for it's tea as it's legendary toilets!
